name: Recorded Future Sandbox
description: App for Recorded Future Sandbox submissions

api_key.description: The API key from the Recorded Future Sandbox account

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Run the file in the sandbox and retrieve the analysis results

vault_id.description: Vault ID of file to detonate

profile_id.description: The profile to use (standard if left empty)

actions.description: Fetch a Recorded Future Sandbox analysis report based on ID value

analysis_id.description: ID given by Recorded Future Sandbox for the analysis to query

actions.description: Run a url in the sandbox and retrieve the analysis results

kind.description: The kind of URL analysis to run, you can choose between 'url' and 'fetch'. Url launches the url in the sandbox. Fetch lets Recorded Future Sandbox download what's located at the URL and submit it as a file

profile_id.description: The profile to use (standard if left empty)

actions.description: Get the current status of a Recorded Future Sandbox analysis

analysis_id.description: ID given by Recorded Future Sandbox for the analysis to query
